name: Beta Preview
title: Initial Release
description: The public preview of time.co.gg is now live. Please note there are a few known issues: daylight saving time handling is not yet consistent; the time shown for Jersey, Channel Islands may be incorrect; widget transparency can disappear after changes on certain backgrounds; and the main widget may occasionally fall out of sync.

name: Bug Fix
title: Fixes
description: Fixed known issues, the time shown for Jersey, Channel Islands may be incorrect; widget transparency can disappear after changes on certain backgrounds; and the main widget may occasionally fall out of sync.

name: UI Update
title: Button & UI
description: Enhanced button design getting rid of the flat buttons, UI enhancements for better assessability rating.
